message: Developers feel free to post your promo codes and describe your app.
I'm going to try giving away promo codes using Convore. If you redeem a code, please post which app and it would be great if you posted a short review.

Twitlogix promo codes. I think this might be the best Twitter app I've tried (and I've tried them all). It's super fast, fill in the gaps (no missed tweets), and most importantly one-tap links. If you use the promo code, let me know what you think of the app. KWWMWPLLLX73 RARNEY63FY6A
Just listened to the podcast today so missed getting into the promo codes
The first set of codes had already expired. So thanks for the new ones.
If you try out TweetLogix, let me know what you think.
Are the above codes gone? I will be adding new codes all the time.
Here are three more for TweetLogix, which is the best Twitter app I've used. LY76XJXKK34A R3T4WRJ677AX 64TRPMLRRHAF

There are a bunch of new paid apps that allow you to subscribe, download, and stream podcasts right on your iOS device. I'll be reviewing all of them and sharing some promo codes.
Wow I desperate need a new twitter app, hoping there'd be more tweetlogix codes?
The problem is that it ALWAYS uses my GPS and I can't seem to shut that off without going into settings. It's killing my battery
I've tried almost every app but I always go back to the official one. I like it because it's very elegant and focuses on what's inportant
@laurentlogan does that affect your battery? I didn't know that. Thank u
Absolutely does, which is why I'm looking for another app. Sucks cause i like the official twitter app
To-Do Queue is a to-do/productivity app with dropbox, they also have a cheap/free Mac app. HN9F9LLM67YN TMRKWEYNWMM4 L7FXE9EWJ3ME
Thanks Justin gonna give it a try! I've been using 2Do and to be honest it's a bit clunky and expensive. Been looking for an alternative. Thank u. :)
More codes please Justin, I wasn't able to use any of these codes yet. I guess I have to be faster. Thanks

How do you use promo codes? In the app store, when you touch the price it goes to "buy app" and if you touch that, you have bought the app for that price.
@MarkC0082 In the app store select the featured tab, then scroll to the bottom. You'll see the Redeem button there. GL
